{{title|C++ 标准库扩展，版本 2}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib_extensions_2/navbar}}

C++ 库基础扩展的版本 2 (Version 2 of the C++ Extensions for Library Fundamentals)，ISO/IEC TS 19568:2017 在定义于[[cpp/experimental/lib extensions|版本 1]] 中的组件外，还为 C++ 标准库定义了下列组件：

=== C++ 检测手法 ===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/type_traits}}
{{dsc talias | cpp/experimental/is_detected | title=is_detected &lt;br /&gt; detected_t &lt;br /&gt; detected_or |检测 ''模板标识'' 是否良构的别名模板}}
{{dsc class | cpp/experimental/nonesuch |{{c|detected_t}} 在失败时返回的类类型}}
{{dsc end }}

===传播 const 的指针式对象包装器===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/propagate_const}}
{{dsc tclass | cpp/experimental/propagate_const |传播 const 的指针式对象包装器}}
{{dsc end }}

=== 无所有权指针 ===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/memory}}
{{dsc tclass | cpp/experimental/observer_ptr |表示无所有权指针 的类}}
{{dsc end }}

=== {{tt|std::array}} 创建 ===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/array}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc make array}}
{{dsc end }}

=== {{tt|ostream_joiner}} ===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/iterator }}
{{dsc tclass | cpp/experimental/ostream_joiner |写入相继元素到输出流，并以分隔符分隔相邻元素的输出迭代器}}
{{dsc end }}

=== 简单的随机数生成设施 ===
{{anchor|逐线程引擎}}为每个线程维护一个 {{lc|std::default_random_engine}} 类型的''逐线程引擎''，初始化到不可预测状态，而它为下列函数所用。

{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/random}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc randint }}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc reseed }}
{{dsc header | experimental/algorithm}}
{{dsc tfun | cpp/experimental/sample |从序列随机选择 n 个元素}}
{{dsc tfun | cpp/experimental/shuffle|随机地重排范围中的元素}}
{{dsc end }}

===特性测试宏===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/type_traits}}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_logical_traits | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201511}} 的值，指示支持逻辑运算符类型特性}}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_detect | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201505}} 的值，指示支持检测手法}}

{{dsc header | experimental/propagate_const }}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_propagate_const | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201505}} 的值，指示支持 {{c|propagate_const}}}}

{{dsc header | experimental/functional }}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_not_fn | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201406}} 的值，指示支持 {{c|not_fn}} }}

{{dsc header | experimental/memory }}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_observer_ptr | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201411}} 的值，指示支持 {{c|observer_ptr}}}}

{{dsc header | experimental/array}}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_make_array | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201505}} 的值，指示支持 {{c|make_array}}}}

{{dsc header | experimental/iterator}}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_ostream_joiner | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201411}} 的值，指示支持 {{c|ostream_joiner}}}}

{{dsc header | experimental/vector }}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_erase_if | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201411}} 的值，指示支持统一容器擦除}}

{{dsc header | experimental/numeric}}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_gcd_lcm | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201411}} 的值，指示支持 {{c|gcd}} 和 {{c|lcm}}}}

{{dsc header | experimental/random}}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_randint| nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201511}} 的值，指示支持 {{c|randint}}}}

{{dsc header | experimental/source_location}}
{{dsc macro const | __cpp_lib_experimental_source_location | nolink=true |至少为 {{c|201505}} 的值，指示支持 {{c|source_location}}}}
{{dsc end}}

==已并入 C++17==
库基础 v2 的下列组件已被采纳到 C++17 标准。

{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/type_traits}}
{{dsc talias | cpp/experimental/void_t |{{tt|void}} 的变长别名模板}}
{{dsc header | experimental/type_traits}}
{{dsc tclass | cpp/experimental/conjunction |变长逻辑与元函数}}
{{dsc tclass | cpp/experimental/disjunction |变长逻辑或元函数}}
{{dsc tclass | cpp/experimental/negation |逻辑非元函数}}
{{dsc header | experimental/functional}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc not_fn}}
{{dsc header | experimental/numeric}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc gcd}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc lcm}}
{{dsc end }}

==已并入 C++20==
库基础 v2 的下列组件已被采纳到 C++20 标准。

=== 统一容器擦除 ===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/string}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase |basic_string|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |basic_string|mark=no}}
{{dsc header | experimental/deque}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase |deque|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |deque|mark=no}}
{{dsc header | experimental/vector}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase |vector|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |vector|mark=no}}
{{dsc header | experimental/forward_list}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase |forward_list|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |forward_list|mark=no}}
{{dsc header | experimental/list}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase |list|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |list|mark=no}}
{{dsc header | experimental/map}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |map|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |multimap|mark=no}}
{{dsc header | experimental/set}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |set|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |multiset|mark=no}}
{{dsc header | experimental/unordered_map}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |unordered_map|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |unordered_multimap|mark=no}}
{{dsc header | experimental/unordered_set}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |unordered_set|mark=no}}
{{cpp/experimental/dsc erase if |unordered_multiset|mark=no}}
{{dsc end }}

=== 源码信息捕获 ===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/source_location}}
{{dsc class | cpp/experimental/source_location |表示关于源码的，如文件名、行号和函数名的信息}}
{{dsc end }}

=== {{tt|std::array}} 转换 ===

{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc header | experimental/array}}
{{dsc inc | cpp/experimental/dsc to array}}
{{dsc end }}
